entry.title: MergePDF_V01
entry.content:
When serval people are writing at the same time or an article needs different layout styles, it is necessary to merge the pdf file.

MergePDF_V01 is a simple MATLAB app to merge serval PDF files.

Demo

Figure 1　GUI layout
  • Step 1 Select input PDF files

Figure 2　Select input files

File names in the cell array are sorted in the order that the user's platform uses

  • Step 2 Select output path and merge files

Figure 3　Merge PDF files

Download

You and download the codes at https://github.com/FE-Lucky-Rain/Tool
entry.summary:
When serval people are writing at the same time or an article needs different layout styles, it is necessary to merge the pdf file.

entry.title: Welcome to ROTA!
entry.content:
Welcome to the ROTA documentation site! ROTA is a opensource MATLAB tool for the simulation.

ROTA starts from mesh generation to component modelling, trying to connect control, engineering calculation, finite element analysis and multi-body analysis

Framework

Download

Contact me

  • If you have any questions, you can contact me on the email xy392176462@gmail.com
